name: Laboratory of the devil
description: You are a special agent who took photos of strange experiments in a hidden cyrotechnical laboratory. As you want to leave the lab, the exit is unreachable. Someone lowered the bridge which led over an acid-pool. Where is the switch to raise the bridge again ? To find it, you have to fight through many guards. Be careful ! There are many cryochambers which contain dangerous mutants. But the greatest horror lies in the great hall. There is the GREAT CRYOCHAMBER ...
